meanings.sent1: The hierarchal structure of the company placed the CEO at the top.
meanings.sent2: The military has a hierarchal system with different ranks.
meanings.sent3: The hierarchal order of the animals in the zoo made the penguin the king of the exhibit.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a hierarchy.
meanings.sent1: The hierarchal structure of the government determined the order of power.
meanings.sent2: The hierarchal system in the company ensured clear lines of authority.
meanings.sent3: The hierarchal relationship between the characters in the play added drama to the story.
meanings.sent4: The hierarchal levels of the organization were like steps leading to the top.
meanings.sent5: The hierarchal nature of the family was evident in the eldest sibling's role as the decision-maker.
